title: Bug Analysis: User Photos Not Displaying
description: Root cause analysis of production issue #2847

phases.name: Gathering Symptoms
observations: Frontend displays broken image icons for user photos
Photo file paths are stored correctly in database

rules.name: 404 Means Not Found Rule
rules.conclusion: Files are not found at the requested URLs

rules.name: Path Mismatch Rule
rules.conclusion: Path mismatch between database and filesystem

phases.name: Checking Assumptions
phases.description: Validating initial assumptions about the system
observations: Web server is configured to serve /uploads/ directory
No deployment changes in past 24 hours

rules.name: Assumption Wrong Rule
rules.conclusion: One of our assumptions is incorrect

phases.name: Root Cause Discovery
phases.description: Found the actual cause via git history
observations: Recent code change moved uploads to /media/ directory
Web server still configured for /uploads/ directory
Configuration mismatch between code and server

rules.name: Configuration Mismatch Rule
rules.conclusion: ROOT CAUSE: Configuration mismatch after code deployment

rules.name: Fix Needed Rule
rules.conclusion: FIX: Update web server config to serve /media/ directory
